title: Riot Rank Match Making
body: Can you guise just remove duo q I mean we getting trolls who work together and you can neva surrender early so how are we supposed to fight them back. Reports will keep adding up and that'll take longer than expected as next game they'll play serious. What can we do to remove these players honestly?

replies.body: afk and feed before they do so they get counter rekt. it happened to me. i was been disrespected so i was going to afk but that fgt afk first lel. vry funny b0ss
